title: Congress Workers Misleadingly Blamed for Vandalism of Solar Panels
subtitle: The video was actually of an incident in February 2018 at a solar plant in Maharastra, where workers were protesting against non-payment of wages.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
“#अनपढ़_जाहिल_कांग्रेसी लोग मोदी सरकार के करोड़ों के प्रोजेक्ट को नुक्सान पंहुचाते हुए…. फिर कहेंगे कि कहां है विकास….? हमें तो बिजली मिलती ही नहीं….! #आतंकवादी_कांग्रेस के बहकावे में लोग अपना भला–बुरा भी भूल चुके हैं” (Illiterate uncouth Congressis are damaging project worth crores by the Modi Government… Then they say where is development? We don’t get electricity... These people who are enticed by terrorist Congress have forgotten their own good or bad)

A video has resurfaced on social media with the aforementioned message. In the video, a group of people can be seen vandalising solar panels.
